name: Grav Arts (tech demo)
description:
I'm working on a 3d platformer engine using Unity. I'm using a kinematic platformer (no physics forces) to achieve better controls in hopes of achieving similar gameplay as Kingdom Hearts. It evolved into a planetary gravity shifting game ala Mario Galaxy. Please try this demo on PC and also on your browser via mobile and / or PC.

This is also to test out Unity 2020's multitouch support for WebGL on mobile.

Left Stick / WASD : Move
Right Stick / Mouse : Look
A/Space : Jump
X / LMB / (Mobile: Tap Right Screen): Attack
B / RMB (Mobile: Double Tap Right Screen) : Dodge Roll / Air Dash
Start / R : Reset

Currently you can run on blue walls. You can enter another planet's gravity. Attack and defeat enemies. Try to dash in and out of the planets.

This game is a prototype/tech demo
